name: Sloppyg
description:
full version is out, the top one is recommended but the beta is always there if you really want to.

WASD: Player 1 movement (red)

Arrows: Player 2 movement (blue)

IJKL: Player 3 movement (green)

Numpad(8,4,5,6): Player 4 movement (yellow)

R: Reset Score

Esc: Pause menu

please give me feedback on the game i will appreciate it a lot
